title: The Canada Pension Plan Is Funding Trump’s Fossil Fuel and AI Ambitions
description: The US is waging a trade war on Canada and destabilizing the climate. The CPP is pouring billions into the effortThe post The Canada Pension Plan Is Funding Trump’s Fossil Fuel and AI Ambitions first appeared on The Walrus.

title: The travertine quarries that built ancient Rome are carving rock for a new generation of temples
description: Today, the same quarries that built Rome with their distinctive pock-marked travertine are still being dug out to build a new generation of churches, temples and mosques around the world — as well as banks, museums, government buildings and private homes.

title: Ancient teeth, enduring patterns: Mummy study supports oral-cardiovascular disease link
description: Analysis of CT scans from 37 Egyptian mummies found dental disease and cardiovascular disease traveled together in ancient remains — much as they do today.

title: Verona prepares its ancient arena for the Olympics Closing Ceremony on Sunday
description: Verona will host the final act of the Winter Olympics on Sunday inside the ancient Roman arena, where athletes will celebrate their feats against a backdrop of Italian music and dance.
